=====================================
Sim Science Test Monorepo - Core
=====================================

The core package provides fundamental functionality for the sim_sci_test_monorepo.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
   api_reference/index

Installation
============

Install the core package using pip:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install sim-sci-test-monorepo-core

Quick Start
===========

.. code-block:: python

   from sim_sci_test_monorepo.core import utils
   
   # Use core functionality
   result = utils.example_function()
